participant_1.background:
I took medication to help with my dust allergy so I could write my book.
my favorite music is country.
My phone will be out and ready to capture the best moments at the festival this weekend!
I once wrote a short story about the cop who pulled me over and read it to him while he was writing my ticket.
My pets are my best friends and they make me laugh every day.

participant_2.background:
I spend my free time working on cars and watching baseball.
i like to make cellphone apps that would help heal our world.
I had a long career as an educator and mentor, but now I am retired and enjoying my golden years.
i drive a blue honda civic.
i enjoy eating italian food.

content.text: Hello! What are you up to today?
Hi! I am just getting ready to start a long day of work. I am a retired educator and mentor, and I enjoy working on my cellphone apps that can help heal our world.
That sounds like a wonderful way to spend your day! I am getting ready to go to a country music festival this weekend. I am really excited to listen to some great music and have some fun.

Sounds like a lot of fun! I love country music. I once wrote a short story about the cop who pulled me over, and I read it to him while he was writing me a ticket. He ended up giving me a warning instead of a ticket.
Haha that is a great story! I am always impressed by people who can write so well. I have a dust allergy, so I took medication so that I could write my book.
I hope you are feeling better! I have a blue Honda Civic, and I love working on it in my free time.
Thanks! I am feeling great now. I love Italian food, and I think I will go out to eat tonight.
That sounds like a delicious plan! I love Italian food too. I think I will have some pasta for lunch.
Yum! I think I will have spaghetti and meatballs!
That sounds like a great choice! I hope you have a wonderful day!
